name: individualism
content:
individualism noun [U]
(SINGLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the idea that freedom of thought and action for each person is the most important quality of a society, rather than shared effort and responsibility

social studies the idea that each person should think and act independently rather than depending on others: Many Americans believe strongly in individualism.
Add to word list
Add to word list
the principle that the single person is more important than the group and that people should work and own things for their own advantage: What remains of the public realm in an era of economic individualism? Compare
collectivism
